mapper.select: select id,onlineseats_id,type,username,idNumber,area,longitude,latitude,address,wechat_id,phone, date_format(occurrence_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') occurrence_time,description,date_format(alarm_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') alarm_time, picture_url,video_url,audio_url,occurrence_address,case_type, case_level,status from videoalarm_info where wechat_id= #{userid} order by occurrence_time desc limit 0,10

select videoalarm_info.id,onlineseats_id,videoalarm_info.type,username,idNumber,area,longitude,latitude,address,wechat_id,videoalarm_info.phone, date_format(occurrence_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') occurrence_time,description,date_format(alarm_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') alarm_time, picture_url,video_url,audio_url,occurrence_address,a1.dict_name case_type,a2.dict_name case_level,videoalarm_info.status from videoalarm_info LEFT JOIN sys_dict_info a1 on (a1.type = 1 and videoalarm_info.case_type = a1.dict_value) LEFT JOIN sys_dict_info a2 on (a2.type = 2 and videoalarm_info.case_level = a2.dict_value) left join t_receivepoliceinfo on videoalarm_info.onlineseats_id=t_receivepoliceinfo.Id left join t_seatinfo on t_receivepoliceinfo.SeatId = t_seatinfo.Id where t_seatinfo.Id=#{userid} and DATE(occurrence_time) in (select occurrence from (SELECT DISTINCT occurrence from (select DATE(occurrence_time) occurrence from videoalarm_info left join t_receivepoliceinfo on videoalarm_info.onlineseats_id=t_receivepoliceinfo.Id left join t_seatinfo on t_receivepoliceinfo.SeatId = t_seatinfo.Id where t_seatinfo.Id=#{userid} )A order by occurrence desc LIMIT 0,3) as a)

select SeatId from t_receivepoliceinfo where Phone = #{username} and Password = #{password}
